title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\HumanAgentAssistantConfig\SuggestionQueryConfig
name: SuggestionQueryConfig
description:
Config for suggestion query.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.HumanAgentAssistantConfig.SuggestionQueryConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.knowledge_base_query_source
params.description: Query from knowledgebase. It is used by: ARTICLE_SUGGESTION, FAQ.

params.name: data.document_query_source
params.description: Query from knowledge base document. It is used by: SMART_REPLY, SMART_COMPOSE.

params.name: data.dialogflow_query_source
params.description: Query from Dialogflow agent. It is used by DIALOGFLOW_ASSIST.

params.name: data.max_results
params.description: Maximum number of results to return. Currently, if unset, defaults to 10. And the max number is 20.

params.name: data.confidence_threshold
params.description: Confidence threshold of query result. Agent Assist gives each suggestion a score in the range [0.0, 1.0], based on the relevance between the suggestion and the current conversation context. A score of 0.0 has no relevance, while a score of 1.0 has high relevance. Only suggestions with a score greater than or equal to the value of this field are included in the results. For a baseline model (the default), the recommended value is in the range [0.05, 0.1]. For a custom model, there is no recommended value. Tune this value by starting from a very low value and slowly increasing until you have desired results. If this field is not set, it defaults to 0.0, which means that all suggestions are returned. Supported features: ARTICLE_SUGGESTION, FAQ, SMART_REPLY, SMART_COMPOSE.

params.name: data.context_filter_settings
params.description: Determines how recent conversation context is filtered when generating suggestions. If unspecified, no messages will be dropped.

methods.name: getConfidenceThreshold
methods.description:
Confidence threshold of query result.

Agent Assist gives each suggestion a score in the range [0.0, 1.0], based on the relevance between the suggestion and the current conversation context. A score of 0.0 has no relevance, while a score of 1.0 has high relevance. Only suggestions with a score greater than or equal to the value of this field are included in the results. For a baseline model (the default), the recommended value is in the range [0.05, 0.1]. For a custom model, there is no recommended value. Tune this value by starting from a very low value and slowly increasing until you have desired results. If this field is not set, it defaults to 0.0, which means that all suggestions are returned. Supported features: ARTICLE_SUGGESTION, FAQ, SMART_REPLY, SMART_COMPOSE.

Generated from protobuf field float confidence_threshold = 5;

For a baseline model (the default), the recommended value is in the range [0.05, 0.1]. For a custom model, there is no recommended value. Tune this value by starting from a very low value and slowly increasing until you have desired results. If this field is not set, it defaults to 0.0, which means that all suggestions are returned. Supported features: ARTICLE_SUGGESTION, FAQ, SMART_REPLY, SMART_COMPOSE.
